title: CSS Customization
description: Customize the firefox UI with css

macos-native-tabbar.css.description: Enable translucency in the tab bar on mac

sliding-bookmarks-menu.css.description: Auto-hide bookmarks menu and show on hover

hide-solo-tab.css.description: Hide tabs bar when there's only 1 tab

min-max-close_buttons.css.description: Use macOS style min, max and close buttons

remove_min_max_close.css.description: Remove the min, max and close buttons

no_search_engines_in_url_bar.css.description: Turn off icons for 'Search with __' in the URL bar

privacy_change_email_text.css.description: Replace email in menu with 'Firefox account' instead

show_searchbar_dots_only_on_hover.css.description: Show search bar dots (on the side of the URL bar) only on hover

ublock_icon_change.css.description: Change uBlock icon to a SVG
